arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Borussia Dortmund Prediction: Will Erling Haaland Haunt his Former Club?
arts.sum: We look ahead to Wednesday's UEFA Champions League game with our Manchester City vs Borussia Dortmund prediction and preview. The post Manchester City vs Borussia Dortmund Prediction: Will Erling Haaland Haunt his Former Club? appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola takes unprecedented step and gives Man City stars the DAY OFF - despite playing in the Champions League against Borussia Dortmund tomorrow
arts.sum: The decision is believed to have been made to keep legs fresh ahead of their fourth game of the competition and Guardiola has been consistent in his complaints at the packed fixture schedule.
